## The Importance of Data

Data is the foundation of any machine learning project.
 The quality and quantity of your data often matter more than the sophistication of your model.



## Popular Data Sources

- [Eindhoven open data](https://data.eindhoven.nl/pages/home/)
  - lots of data about Eindhoven
